Method Summary
 boolean contains(ProofRule rule)
          Returns true if the proof rule set contains the specified proof rule, false otherwise.
 Language getLanguage()
          Returns the Language to which the proof rules within this proof rule set belong.
 ProofRule[] getRules()
          Returns an array with all ProofRules in this set of proof rules.

Method Detail

getLanguage

Language getLanguage()
Returns the Language to which the proof rules within this proof rule set belong.

Returns:
the language of the proof rules.
See Also:
Language

getRules

ProofRule[] getRules()
Returns an array with all ProofRules in this set of proof rules. The returned array is sorted using the sort order defined by the ProofRules implementation of the Comparable interface. The returned array is sorted using the sort order defined by the ProofRules implementation of the Comparable interface.

Returns:
an array with all ProofRules.
See Also:
ProofRule

contains

boolean contains(ProofRule rule)
Returns true if the proof rule set contains the specified proof rule, false otherwise.

Parameters:
rule - the ProofRule to look for.
Returns:
true if the proof rule set contains the rule.
